with.from sentence: Our SEASS model with beam search outperforms all baseline models by a large margin .

Even for.from sentence: Even for greedy search , our model still performs better than other methods which used beam search .

For the popular.from sentence: For the popular ROUGE - 2 metric , our SEASS model achieves 17.54 F1 score and performs better than the previous works .

ABS model.from sentence: Compared to the ABS model , our model has a 6.22 ROUGE - 2 F1 relative gain .

highest CAs 2s baseline.from sentence: Compared to the highest CAs 2s baseline , our model achieves 1.57 ROUGE - 2 F1 improvement and passes the significant test according to the official ROUGE script .

SEASS.from sentence:
DUC 2004
As summarized in , our SEASS outperforms all the baseline methods and achieves 29.21 , 9.56 and 25.51 for ROUGE 1 , 2 and L recall .

ABS + model.from sentence: Compared to the ABS + model which is tuned using DUC 2003 data , our model performs significantly better by 1.07 ROUGE - 2 recall score and is trained only with English Gigaword sentence - summary data without being tuned using DUC data .
